value.0: Greetings, <Master/Mistress>, might you be interested in my pets?
Very Well. It looks well taken care of.
I can buy it back from you for <CUSTOM2101> gold coins!
Excellent! What can I help you with about Pets?
Sorry to hear that. I do hope you'll return soon.
Why, to be your pet of course, or your companion. They will help protect you as well! They are each trained to obey their Master.....even if it means they will die protecting you.
Would you like to choose now?
Well.....you will lose the pet. With a dead pet I cannot purchase it from you either. You will simply have to purchase another one. This is of course good business for us. **HUGE Smile**
Well I have various types of pets for you to choose. They are all well trained.
The selection is what you see in the cage behind me Tell me which one you like.
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?

Excellent! Here you are! Come back again!

I will purchase this Pet when you don't need it any longer. Just come back to me when you do. I charge a 50% fee to buy the animal.
A fine pet. Shall I prepare it?
Nevermind.
I would like to trade my Pet.
Yes. I would like to sell it back to you.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a good pet.
Yes I would.
Just looking. I will come back again some other time.
No, I don't think so today.
What exactly does one use a pet for?
What happens if the pet dies?
Thanks for the info.
I think I could use a pet. How much are they?
Well what do you have?
I like the <CUSTOM2119> for <CUSTOM2219> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2118> for <CUSTOM2218> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2117> for <CUSTOM2217> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2116> for <CUSTOM2216> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2115> for <CUSTOM2215> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2114> for <CUSTOM2214> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2113> for <CUSTOM2213> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2112> for <CUSTOM2212> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2111> for <CUSTOM2211> coins.
Sounds like a fine deal to me.
Thanks and I'll remember that.
I like the <CUSTOM2110> for <CUSTOM2210> coins.
